column1: Family and friends of Mr. McRainey are invited to attend his memorial service beginning at 11:00 AM Tuesday in the Sanctuary of the First Presbyterian Church of Gastonia. The Reverend Doctor John L. Frye
column3: Reverend Lauren Sease Vanacore and Pastor John H. Stanley will officiate. Burial will be private. The family will receive friends from 6:00 PM until 8:00 PM Monday at McLean Funeral Directors of Gastonia.
